channel.title: Ethernet Cloud on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Ethernet Cloud on 0x000216

item.title: VPLS Is The Ethernet Cloud
item.description: We’re all familiar with cloud networks, but wouldn’t it be great to have a private cloud connecting all your business locations? Virtual Private LAN Service (VPLS) offers a solution. While not a fully private cloud, it comes close. VPLS allows you to share a private multipoint network built on technology like Multi-Protocol Label Switching (MPLS). MPLS networks can handle various traffic types, including Ethernet, making it ideal for diverse needs.
